tool_description: Fast, Simple, and Reliable Scraping API. Includes JavaScript rendering and automatic rotating proxies for ALL plans.
name: BuzzScrape
title: BuzzScrape

api_list.name: screenshot
api_list.description: Returns base64 encoded screenshot for full page or specific selector

api_list.name: scrape
api_list.description: Scrape the HTML or text from a page.

required_parameters.name: return_type
required_parameters.description: Return type: either html or text. IMPORTANT NOTE: If the value is set to html and you push the test endpoint  button in RapidAPI it wont render the HTML response properly. Instead try it out on your own with curl or your preferred coding language to get the HTML results. That's what the free plan is for :)

optional_parameters.name: cookies
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated cookies in format: cookie=cookievalue
